12245152474327786.Text: I found Mossanon in Sadrith Mora and confronted him about the embezzled funds. He admitted his crime, and offered to return 2500 gold -- he had spent the rest -- and pay back the rest as soon as he could, if I'd promise to keep his whereabouts secret from Canctunian Ponius. I took no immediate action, giving myself time to consider his offer.

15148203232274431572.Text: Imperial Cult: Pledge from Canctunian Ponius
